word: MR. HAZEN KELLY, OWNER OF THE FIFTY-FIVE ACRES LYING ON THE EAST SIDE OF PEPPER DRIVE, NORTH OF THE RAILWAY, ONCE OFFERED US AT $20,000, SOLD OFF EIGHT ACRES, LYING ALONG THE EAST SIDE OF PEPPER DRIVE, AT $400 AN ACRE, TO A NUMBER OF OUR BRETHREN. THESE EIGHT ACRES HAVE BEEN DIVIDED AND SUB-DIVIDED AND BUILT ON UNTIL THERE ARE NOW ON THIS PORTION OF LAND TWENTY-TWO COTTAGES OCCUPIED BY PHYSICIANS AND WORKERS OF THE SANITARIUM.
